name: Teddy? (HeylloPotato)
description:
Teddy? A horror game made for Ludum Dare 46!
Play in full screen for a better experience!

Controls:
A & D to Move
Space to Jump
X to interact
Q to change battery
E to turn flashlight off

Objective of teddy is to get to the room in the house so you can sleep till morning, where it isn't raining, dark or cold out!
